alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:02AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, Southeast Missouri and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 1 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
